action.action-desc: Mr. Roberts (for himself, Mrs. Shaheen, Mr. Kirk, and Mr. Brown) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve access to medication therapy management under part D of the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Medication Therapy Management Empowerment Act of 2015.

section.header: Improved access to medication therapy management under part D of the Medicare program

subsection.text: Section 1860D–4(c)(2)(A)(ii)(I) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395w–104(c)(2)(A)(ii)(I)) is amended by inserting or have a single chronic disease of cardiovascular disease, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, hyperlipidemia, or diabetes before the semicolon at the end.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to plan years beginning on or after January 1, 2016.
